name: Desired Track
description:
Lost and Found – Desired Track

You are a tiny planet lost in a vast, infinite universe. The various planets have varying effects on your existence; some will attract you, while others will repel you. The gravitational forces exerted by the various planets have varying effects on you, and you must use the 'forces' they exert on you to navigate and eventually find your way out. Take care not to get too close to the planet while looking for a route! Some powerful attractions may kill you.

 

Controls – Use the mouse to control the planet to find the exit!
